revised_title: The Function of Hormones in Stimulating Enzymic Change and its Relation to Narcosis and Degenerative and Regenerative Change in Living Structures
tldr: The authors investigate the role of hormones in stimulating enzymic change in living structures, particularly in relation to narcosis and the phenomena of degenerative and regenerative change. They explore the effects of various substances on plant growth and enzymatic activity, using a delicate test involving the reaction of hydrogen cyanide with alkaline sodium picrate.
